A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wish I could give this a big fat 0 stars. I can't believe people are giving this more than 1 star. It sucked really bad. The Star Wars series was just killed in every way possible. I'm a life long fan and they shot themselves in the foot. The Force Awakens was bad enough the way they killed off Han Solo. At least let him save a planet by flying the Falcon into the planet death star or something along that line. Still sick from the experience. Pissed off fan here.
